participant_1.background: i just bought a house recently. i'm married with two kids. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.background: i love playing softball. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. my mom passed away when i was young. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

content.text: No i am not. I do not have any kids.
